get.summary: Advise all lines in a purchase order
get.description: Advise all lines in a purchase order

200.description: The transaction was executed as requested

parameters.name: cono
parameters.description: The company context to use. Defaults to user default

parameters.name: divi
parameters.description: The division context to use. Defaults to user default

parameters.name: lanc
parameters.description: The language code to use. Defaults to user default

parameters.name: maxrecs
parameters.description: Max number of records returned. 0 is unlimited

parameters.name: excludeempty
parameters.description: When true, empty fields are omitted in response

parameters.name: righttrim
parameters.description: When true, all values are right trimmed in response

parameters.name: returncols
parameters.description: A comma separated list of column names that should be included in the response. Defaults to all columns

parameters.name: extendedresult
parameters.description: Show transaction parameters in the response
